pageContext.claim: “Anybody throwing stones, rocks -- like they did to Mexico and the Mexican military, Mexican police, where they badly hurt police and soldiers of Mexico -- we will consider that a firearm, because there's not much difference.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump equated throwing rocks with carrying firearms, an absurd comparison, to justify the authorization of lethal force by the U.S. military on immigrants in the Central American caravan. There was a skirmish at the Mexican border, but these comments are an exaggeration. A few Mexican police officers were injured, and reports suggest those injuries were not serious.
